mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_birth, user_pwd, user_name, user_nick, user_phone, user_email, join_date, user_info_agree, user_serv_agree, user_login_time, user_active, user_status ) values(#{user_id},#{user_birth}, #{user_pwd},#{user_name},#{user_nick},#{user_phone},#{user_email}, #{join_date},#{user_info_agree}, #{user_serv_agree}, #{user_login_time}, #{user_active},#{user_status})
mapper.select: select * from user where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pwd=#{user_pwd}
